name: H2O Phases
description:
H2O Phases is a platform/puzzle game which limits the characters movement abilities. The character controlled by the player is made of water and can change its form to be able to reach certain areas and collect hearts. The ice form is the only one that can move horizontally using the keyboard arrows. Use Q, W and E to change water phases and R to reset the level.
